title: MCC Services

author: casinnola

comments.content:
I suspect this is another use of a freebie techno font. Have you tried searching the Sci-fi or square categories at [Dafont](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828203057/http:/www.dafont.com/)?

- Mike Yanega
I looked on Dafont and MyFonts. Couldn't find anything like that.

Yea, I had the same problem. I wonder if this is custom drawn using a regular sans just for the M. Everything else is all straight lines.

- Mike Yanega
